Learn more about The Center for the Arts at River Ridge!
Book Your Next Event
T
he Center for the Arts at River Ridge is a premier, full-service performing arts venue proudly serving over 40 Pasco County District schools, as well as a wide range of community organizations, local artists, and nationally touring productions. For nearly 30 years, the Center has been a cornerstone of cultural and artistic expression in the region, dedicated to delivering professional-quality stage productions in an accessible and inspiring setting
Equipped with state-of-the-art digital lighting, audio, and multimedia capabilities, the Center is designed to meet the technical demands of virtually any performance or event. Whether it’s a student play, a community concert, or a large-scale touring show, each production is supported with the
same level of expertise and attention to detail. The Center’s experienced and passionate staff are committed to optimizing every performance—large or small—for both participants and audiences. Their goal is to ensure that each event is not only seamless and successful but also truly memorable. With a reputation for excellence, innovation, and community engagement, The Center for the Arts at River Ridge continues to be a vibrant hub for creativity, education, and entertainment in Pasco County and beyond.
The Five Fold Mission:
1.
To meet the educational needs of Pasco students by providing musical, dramatic, and cultural experiences that tie into ongoing classroom curriculum.
2.
To serve as a professional quality performance and production venue for District drama, band, dance, and choral programs; presenting curriculum-based shows, recitals, and concerts.
3.
To host presentations, ceremonies, and other special events for the District School system and Pasco County Government.
4.
To be available for rental by local community-based performance organizations and other appropriate groups.
5.
To present professional productions, concerts and other events to the public.

Contact Us
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about upcoming events, rental inquiries, technical specifications, or school and community partnerships, the team at the Center for the Arts at River Ridge is here to help. Please reach out to us directly by phone or email. We’re committed to providing prompt, friendly support to make your experience with us as smooth and memorable as possible.
General Inquiries

Upcoming Special Events
The Elite Standup Comedy Show vol. 10
September 12, 2025 @ 8:00pm
The Elite Stand‑Up Comedy Show
is Egypt’s top comedy event, featuring a powerhouse lineup of local stand-up stars. Known for sold-out shows and sharp, relatable humor, it brings high-energy laughs to audiences across the country.
Ahmed Amin presents "Meen Amin?!"
October 11, 2025 @ 9:00pm
Ahmed Amin
is one of Egypt’s most dynamic contemporary comedians, celebrated for his sharp wit and relatable humor. He first rose to fame with his viral online sketches, leading to the hit TV series
Al-Plateau
and the acclaimed sketch show
Amin wa Shorakah
. Beyond comedy, Amin showcased his versatility as the lead in Netflix’s
Paranormal
, winning international recognition.
Backtrack Blues Band and Annika Chambers – "A Big Night With The Blues"
November 15, 2025 @ 7:30pm
Backtrack Blues Band
is a Florida-based group known for its high-energy, Chicago-style blues. Active since the 1980s, they’ve shared stages with legends like B.B. King and are praised for their authentic sound and dynamic live shows.
River Ridge Royal Knights present
River Ridge Middle School – "Beetlejuice Jr"
October 24, 2025 @ 11:00am & 7:00pm
October 25, 2025 @ 2:00pm & 7:00pm
Get ready for a frightfully fun night!
River Ridge Middle School
presents
Beetlejuice Jr
.
, a high-energy musical full of quirky characters, big songs, and supernatural laughs. Don’t miss our talented students bringing the strange and unusual to life with their own spirited spin on this cult classic!
River Ridge High School – "Puffs"
October 31, 2025 @ 7:30pm
November 1, 2025 @ 2:00pm & 7:30pm
Get ready for a magical night of laughs!
River Ridge High School
presents
Puffs, or Seven Increasingly Eventful Years at a Certain School of Magic and Magic
—a fast-paced comedy about the underdog house at a famous wizarding school. Full of clever humor, heart, and a dash of mischief, this student production is perfect for anyone who’s ever felt like they weren’t the chosen one.
